params.name: should_training_stop
params.description: Whether or not the training should be interrupted.If True, this variable will not be set back to False. The training will just stop.

params.name: should_epoch_stop
params.description: Whether or not the current epoch should be interrupted.If True, this variable will be set back to False at the beginning of the next epoch.

params.name: should_save
params.description: Whether or not the model should be saved at this step.If True, this variable will be set back to False at the beginning of the next step.

params.name: should_evaluate
params.description: Whether or not the model should be evaluated at this step.If True, this variable will be set back to False at the beginning of the next step.

params.name: should_log
params.description: Whether or not the logs should be reported at this step.If True, this variable will be set back to False at the beginning of the next step.
